attributes.action: Replace the current national anthem with "The National Anthem" by Radiohead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The national anthem is a stale dirge, it needs to be brought into the 21st century.  Radiohead have contributed a great deal to the United Kingdom, both culturally and economically, more so than the monarchy, and so the national anthem should be changed to reflect this.
